lead_paragraph: Desperate for a victory, the Detroit Pistons needed to catch a break. Cleveland Cavaliers coach Tyronn Lue delivered that gift a day after Christmas, resting the game's biggest star.

headline.print_headline: Pistons Stun Cavs to Ease Out of Slump
headline.main: Pistons Stun Cavs to Ease Out of Slump

snippet: Desperate for a victory, the Detroit Pistons needed to catch a break. Cleveland Cavaliers coach Tyronn Lue delivered that gift a day after Christmas, resting the game's biggest star....
